title: Giant Launches All-New Rivet MIPS Aero Helmet
content:
Giant just pulled the covers off its all-new Rivet MIPS, a fully redesigned aero helmet built for athletes chasing podiums in time trials and triathlons. After extensive wind tunnel testing and pro-level validation, the new lid boasts a refined shape, updated safety features, and a serious upgrade in aerodynamic efficiency.

Engineered for Speed (and Sanity)

According to Giant, the Rivet MIPS sheds 6.4 watts off the previous model thanks to its slippery new shape — a silhouette fine-tuned through Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), real-world testing, and feedback from the pros. The helmet’s lean profile, internal channeling, and air management system work in tandem to reduce drag while maintaining high airflow so your brain stays cool during peak effort.

MIPS Protection, Dialed In

Tucked inside is MIPS Air Node, a featherweight layer that adds impact protection without compromising ventilation or weight. It’s an innovative, minimalist solution that keeps things race-legal and crash-ready — perfect for riders toeing the line at Kona or sprinting out of the start gate in a UCI time trial.

Pro-Tested, Race-Proven

The Rivet MIPS has already been put through its paces by Team Jayco AlUla and Ironman World Champion Gustav Iden, lending it serious real-world credibility. Whether it’s long-course triathlons or pancake-flat time trials, the helmet is already proving itself where it counts — on race day.

Built for Comfort and Clean Lines

Weighing in at 503g (size medium), the Rivet MIPS strikes a balance between aero performance and all-day comfort. A lightweight strap system, micro-adjustable fit, and magnetic Fidlock buckle make for easy on and off, as well as a secure fit at speed. A detachable visor with anti-fog coating and UV protection keeps your vision clear and your profile aero.

Giant Rivet MIPS – Features

  • The CFD-modeled and wind tunnel-validated aerodynamic design achieves a 6.4-watt reduction compared to the previous model.
  • Low-drag dual vent system with internal airflow channeling
  • Streamlined profile for minimal drag and maximum speed
  • Proprietary central dimple shape to optimize airflow
  • Detachable aerodynamic visor with UV protection and anti-fog coating
  • Dual-use visor and rear aero fin system optimized for time trial or triathlon
  • Integrated MIPS Air Node rotational impact protection
  • Fidlock® magnetic buckle for secure one-handed fastening
  • Price: £269.99/$350 (Available late summer for USA)
  • Size: S, M, LRG
  • Colors Options: Matte Black and Matte White
